Class MetricsPlugin

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, Constants, java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.runtime.Preferences.IPropertyChangeListener
public class MetricsPlugin
extends org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin
implements org.eclipse.core.runtime.Preferences.IPropertyChangeListener, Constants

The main plugin class providing access to the metrics framework.

Author:
Frank Sauer
